thread.title: Judd Apatow Compares Trump’s Victory to Rape, Then Attacks Melania
thread.title_full: Judd Apatow Compares Trump’s Victory to Rape, Then Attacks Melania

author: John Falkenberg
title: Judd Apatow Compares Trump’s Victory to Rape, Then Attacks Melania
text:
Arnold Schwarzenegger Wanted to “Smash” President Trump’s Face After Tweet 
Just how out-of-touch do you have to be to think that anything that has happened under President Trump is equivalent to one of the most heinous crimes imaginable? 
He also attacked Melania Trump for the time she doesn’t spend at the White House, saying that she avoids the president so she doesn’t have to have sex. 
“Every day she’s not in the White House is a day she’s not (having relations with) Donald Trump. Wouldn’t you stay away?” he asked. Advertisement –   
In addition to all of that, Apatow targeted 10-year-old Barron Trump , despite a widespread agreement that young children of presidents should be off-limits. 
“He f***ing gets it,” Apatow said of Barron. “You ever see the look on his face when Trump is talking? People are like, ‘Is there something wrong with him?’ No, he knows his dad is a f***ing a*
